itikaf.title: I'tikaf Program
itikaf.itikafSubtitle: Experience the spiritual benefits of I'tikaf. Spend dedicated time in the mosque for worship, reflection, and connection with Allah.
itikaf.ramadanItikafSubtitle: Join our I'tikaf program during the last 10 days of Ramadan. Purify your soul and seek Laylat al-Qadr in the blessed environment of the mosque.
itikaf.itikafDescription: I'tikaf is the practice of secluding oneself in the mosque for a specific period to worship Allah exclusively. It is a time to pause your worldly life, detach from distractions, and focus entirely on prayer, Quran, and reflection.
itikaf.pleaseLoginToRegister: Please log in to register for I'tikaf
itikaf.ramadanSunnahDesc: The last 10 days of Ramadan is the most emphasized Sunnah, seeking the Night of Power.
itikaf.voluntaryNatafilDesc: Can be performed at any time of the year for any duration, even a few hours.
itikaf.durationDesc: Standard Sunnah is 10 days, but minimum duration can be as short as a moment of intention.
itikaf.whyWithUsDesc: We provide a structured environment that takes care of your physical needs so you can focus entirely on your spiritual needs.
itikaf.scholarlyGuidanceDesc: Access to mentors for questions and spiritual counseling.
itikaf.structuredProgramDesc: Daily Halaqas, Quran circles, and Qiyam prayers.

about.title: About MuJemea
about.description: A beacon of faith, knowledge, and community service in the heart of our city.
about.purposeSubtitle: Guided by faith and driven by service
about.missionDesc: At MUJEMA’ TEQWA MOSQUE, we strive to be a welcoming space for worship, learning, and community building. Our mission is to nurture faith, knowledge, and service while preserving Islamic values and traditions.
about.visionDesc: We envision a vibrant community where individuals and families grow spiritually, intellectually, and socially, contributing positively to society at large.
about.worshipDesc: Providing a spiritual home for daily prayers and religious observances.
about.educationDesc: Offering comprehensive Islamic education for all age groups.
about.communityDesc: Building bridges and fostering unity within our diverse community.
about.serviceDesc: Serving humanity through charitable initiatives and social programs.
about.teamSubtitle: The dedicated individuals serving our community

about.journeySubtitle: From humble beginnings to a thriving community center
about.foundationDesc: MUJEMA’ TEQWA MOSQUE was established in 2023 by dedicated community members in Kolfe Keraniyo.
about.firstExpansionDesc: Expanded educational programs and launched the weekly Ders system to serve the growing needs.
about.tenthAnniversaryDesc: Enhanced our facilities and introduced specialized youth and community outreach programs.
about.digitalEraDesc: Launched online services and digital prayer time systems for the community.
about.joinDescription: Be part of a growing community dedicated to faith, learning, and service.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Serving the community with a wide range of religious, educational, and social services.
services.dailyPrayersDesc: Five daily congregational prayers led by our Imams. Join us for Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha.
services.jummahPrayerDesc: Weekly Friday prayer. Khutbah starts at 6:30 LT followed by prayer.
services.islamicEducationDesc: Classes for all ages, including Quran reading, Tajweed, and daily ders program for anyone who want to learn Islam.
services.charityZakatDesc: Distribution of Zakat and Sadaqah to those in need within our community and beyond.
services.matrimonialServicesDesc: Nikah ceremonies and pre-marital counseling services to support building strong families. we will announce soon when the service is available.
services.funeralServicesDesc: Janazah prayer and assistance with funeral arrangements for deceased community members. we will announce soon when the service is available.
services.counselingDesc: Religious and social counseling provided by our Imams for individuals and families. we will announce soon when the service is available.
services.communityEventsDesc: Regular gatherings, lectures, and social events to strengthen our community bonds.
services.youthProgramsDesc: Engaging activities, sports, and mentorship programs specifically designed for our youth. stay tuned for more information.
services.weeklyDersProgramDesc: A structured weekly program of Islamic lectures and lessons (Ders) covering various topics for all levels.
services.contactSubtitle: Contact us for custom arrangements or if you have questions about any of our facilities.
